Title: Kisaku Spirit
Description:
["After Kisaku died, he had a strong desire that his spirit was still wandering around. Yuri noticed a guy who resembled Kisaku, but he was actully a hard worker named Kusaki, who had a good nature and was far different from Kisaku. When they first met, Kisaku's spirit appeared and started to haunt Kusaki. Eventually Kisaku took over Kusaki. ", '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: AnimeNfo)']
